mapper.select: select * from board WHERE not category_idx IN (4) order by board_idx desc LIMIT #{num};
select b.board_idx, b.title, b.created_at, b.hit from board b, category c where c.category_name = #{ctg} and c.category_idx = b.category_idx

select b.board_idx, b.title, b.created_at, b.hit from board b, category c where c.category_name = #{ctg} and c.category_idx = b.category_idx order by b.board_idx desc limit #{startPageNum}, #{records};
select b.*, c.category_name from board b, category c where board_idx = #{boardIdx} and b.category_idx = c.category_idx;

select * from board b WHERE board_idx = ( (SELECT board_idx FROM board where board_idx < #{boardIdx} and category_idx = (select category_idx from board where board_idx = #{boardIdx}) ORDER BY board_idx DESC LIMIT 1));

select * from board b WHERE board_idx = ( (SELECT board_idx FROM board where board_idx > #{boardIdx} and category_idx = (select category_idx from board where board_idx = #{boardIdx}) ORDER BY board_idx LIMIT 1));
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, category_idx ,created_at, hit) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{category},now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, category_idx, created_at, contact_name, contact_email) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, now(), #{contactName}, #{contactEmail} )
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content=#{content} where board_idx = #{boardIdx};
